snippet.title: In Stars and Time - Platform Announcement Gameplay Trailer | Future Of Play Direct 2023
snippet.description:
In Stars and Time tells the story of Siffrin and their adventurer friends—a found family bound together by fate in order to end the tyrannical reign of an evil king. But just as victory is within the party’s grasp, tragedy strikes, the clock resets, and Siffrin discovers they're stuck in a time loop with no way out. With the literal weight of the world on their shoulders, can Siffrin find a way to break the loop before it breaks him?

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1677310/In_Stars_And_Time/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ISAT_game

Watch the full Future Of Play Direct 2023 showcase ► https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=03WtP_HZ1Co 
Wishlist and buy games from Future Of Play Direct ► http://heyglitch.com/cosmicbangers

Find us on Twitter ► https://twitter.com/heyglitch
Website ► http://heyglitch.com/

#FutureOfPlay #indiegames #gaming
